title: #25: The Sex Podcast, Wedding Dresses, Break ups, and Content Distribution
itunes:title: #25: The Sex Podcast, Wedding Dresses, Break ups, and Content Distribution
description:
Taylor O'Conner & Jordan Bosstick, join Lauryn & Michael to discuss Wedding dress shopping, the question of waiting until marriage to have sex for the first time, how to break up with someone in the nicest way possible, and the importance of distributing content.
